TopicTitle: Ribbons for Kerbals / Hall of Fame

Articles.Content:
At the moment the achievement list ("Log") of our Kerbonauts is not really pretty with only unformatted text.

I would like to see this a bit polished like with a small ribbon displayed beside of each body. I know there are mods and/or forum signatures for it, but I would like to have something in the core game to value our great kerbonauts

Also I would really like something like a Hall of Fame in the astraonaut complex where you record the first Kerbal to achieve a specific task with some information about the flight. The info is already stored in the save game, so we can use it, or?
Yeah, so that we can actually give everyone proof jeb did all his BadS stuff
